website_summaries.verdict: One of the most highly rated fruit pickers available for purchase, this exceptional product will not fail to impress.
pros: Durable aluminum frame makes for a lightweight hold
Basket proves extremely easy to use with built-in prongs
Comes with a pad to prevent fruit bruising as it falls
cons: Many customers had issues connecting the pole and the basket head

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool to grab avocados 20+ feet up. Sturdy and easy to use. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: super awesome for picking oranges
customer_reviews.text: super awesome for picking oranges at my girlfriends house - she has a HUGE orange tree that makes like 100 oranges per year, but most of the time they fall on the ground and rot, or birds eat them. now that I have this i can pick the oranges that i cant reach!! there is a trick to it, use the hooks to get around the stem of the orange, and *pull while twisting* - once I mastered this it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Gene C. Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works. The adjustable rode is long enough for most fruit trees. But it works better for fruits which are not too soft. Otherwise, you know what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used for picking pears at the top of a 25 tree. I only used this for one season but im happy with the product so far. I'd say it's little pricey for a fancy stick. But it seems durable and the adjustability is a cinch. A few people complained about getting holes in their fruit I did not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Picker!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does what you’d expect it to do. Has an AMAZING reach! It takes more time to use this then to use a ladder but this is way safer when getting really hard to reach areas. I wish it had rubber protective ends on the plucking rods so that they wouldn’t scrape or pierce your apples occasionally but that’s being pretty picky—pun intended!(*my wife eye-rolling*)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and pick fruits from high trees
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the delivery was delayed more than 4 days from the date originally promised. This after the first fruit picker I ordered was delayed more than 2 weeks and I finally had to cancel that order and order this new one.This fruit picker was easy to put together and I was able to start using right away. I used it to pick papayas from trees as high as 14' and it was really easy to pick. However, sometimes the papaya was too big to fit in the basket and I had to make it free fall and hopefully catch it before it hit the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was actually better than I expected. It was very well packaged and is not too heavy but my sholder was sore after picking fully extended for a while. My only compliant would be that the metal prongs on the basket sometimes puncture the apples I'm picking. But that may be partially a technique issue. Also it is not like ther is a choice of baskets there is literally 1 model that is used on every picker. I may try to fine some type of rubber tips for it. Other than that very happy with the picker.
customer_reviews.author: Jim1186

customer_reviews.title: Great item - would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just what I needed to pick my pears and apples without getting up and down on a ladder. The basket is big enough to pick 2-3 pieces of fruit at a time and the telescoping handle is wonderful. It’s lightweight too. It took a little time to put together because one of the clamps was aligned weirdly but that may have been user error rather than the clamp itself. I definitely recommend this. It did take me a few tries to find the right picking technique but that would be the case for any fruit picker it you haven’t used one before.
customer_reviews.author: R on west coast

customer_reviews.title: great customer service from Ohuhu
customer_reviews.text: the picker arrived with a minor defect: one of the screws to tighten the sleeve clamp was missing a groove. I emailed the company a pic of the defective screw, and they sent me a whole new picker! I now have one to give to my neighbor :) Picker works great. Lightweight, easy to assemble, and good extension length.
customer_reviews.author: rex

customer_reviews.title: The catcher kept coming off.
customer_reviews.text: The catcher came off several times during first use. It was hanging on the orange tree. It also came off and dropped on the ground. I tried to titten it over and over again. I bought it for the one and only tree. It will not have fruit until Oct.. That will be my 2nd try.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Package not complete
customer_reviews.text: The package was incomplete. No clamp (which I know I could go out and get myself) but also no rubber end for the basket to clamp securely onto
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth J Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Nice designed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install this fruit picker tool, and you can adjust the pole from short to long. I could reach every apple and persimmon that I want to get. Basket quality is good and not heavy. I love this fruit picker!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lu

customer_reviews.title: Useful, if a little more flexible than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I realized that my new house had a pear tree in the backyard, and it was being overcome with fruit. It generally works as described, and is fairly easy to assemble. The included net/bag is also super useful, and I now use it for most of my garden as well. On the other hand, at full extension and a bit less than that, it feels a bit too flexible to be as useful as I'd hoped. This means that for some of the tallest fruits, it doesn't quite collect them as well.
customer_reviews.author: mindflare77

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: We received the fruit picker late yesterday afternoon and before dark had picked all of the remaining apples that were too high to reach, even with a ladder. The picker worked well and is well made. The bears are going to be disappointed to find we have picked ALL of the apples.
customer_reviews.author: MTnative

customer_reviews.title: Good helper.
customer_reviews.text: The tool is easy to install. Quality is heavy duty. I love it because it can be extended to high position which I cannot reach the fruits using the ladder. It is easy to pick the fruits, too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: SFKK

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used this one my pair tree today. Using the third extension created a little bend in the pole. That is expected. It worked OK. Nothing spectacular. It is a good value for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, amazing reach, easy to assemble, came quickly and in good order; highly recommended. Easy to reach the topmost oranges on my 20 foot orange tree, with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our apple and Italian plum tree at our new home and because the trees haven't been pruned in years they are very tall. The oicker worked great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this so far. haven' used it a whole lot but have picked a few avocados and it worked very well. I love how it extends and locks. Little bit more tricky when picking from our loquat tree but they grow in clusters so I ended up pulling off some leaves/branch. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the telescoping feature. Easy to maneuver and very sturdy. It was very easy to assemble and directions were spot on. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, easily reached the top of my apple trees.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and gets the job done. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Chiefmoody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you have a fruit tree. Easy to assemble and light weight. Excellent, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best picker ever.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift that won’t be given until August but I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product works as expected and quality is good. Initially part of the picker was damaged in shipping. The company went above and beyond in fixing the issue. Very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Steele

customer_reviews.title: No more dangerous ladder needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for harvesting the hard to reach avocados. I love the padding so the fruit doesn’t get bruised.
customer_reviews.author: Moore Performing Arts, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Love this fruit picker!
customer_reviews.text: We've been shopping for one of these all summer and we are so happy we found this one. It is so easy to extend the pole and made of quality parts. We are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother loved this! Made it so easy for her to pick her oranges.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Muenchow

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Muscle burner when full length. (18 feet)
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Four stars on assemble and lightweight; due to slight crooked hooks and it becomes a bit heavier when its used with a full range. Overall, it a great product. Avocados for life!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping pole makes picking limes a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Telescoping pole is easy to use. I’m excited I can now reach the limes high up in the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Venus Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on pears.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for picking pears. Will try on plums next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I have a lemon tree and it was hard to get the ones at the top. Well not anymore. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sara LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: it's not a childs toy
customer_reviews.text: That you can select the length that you need. I use it for picking apples
customer_reviews.author: John F Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, better than I thought it was going to be
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: Really simple and easy to use. It can be short or super long, I haven’t had a problem getting fruit from off my tree. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, effective and does not damage the fruit
customer_reviews.author: Jane K

customer_reviews.text: Works great! Could use one more extension on my tree.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Apple picker works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I like the longer reach so I can reach those apples at the top of the tree too and the tool is light weight enough to wind it through the tree branches. the cushioned bottom really helps save the fruit
customer_reviews.author: Jarrig Visser

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: With this picker we were able to pick every single Asian Persimmon from the tree, even those on the very top. Four of our grandchildren ages 7, 10, 12, 13 were able to pick fruit with it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Tate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for RA/Fibromyalgia sufferers.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mother in law who has fibromyalgia and RA but still climbs her apple tree. She actually used this and LOVES it. Her apple are an easily bruising variety so she puts a small rag in the bottom of the basket so they don’t bruise in the picking process. She loves it and we wish we had it for her a decade ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Apples everywhere
customer_reviews.text: How did i live without this apple picker! works great and no ladder required!
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to adjust the pole while picking apples. No twisting just a simple move of my thumb. Nice and long and very stable when fully extended.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed to pick the apples that we couldn't reach!
customer_reviews.text: We were able to harvest fruit that would have gone to waste because we couldn't reach them. Very useful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great fruit picking tool
customer_reviews.text: Makes getting those oranges that are so high up much easier to pick and reduces the danger of standing on a ladder, plus we get to eat more if those sweet oranges!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally write reviews
customer_reviews.text: but this product is outstanding. And I can't believe it was such a low price. I have a great reach to get to fruit I never would have been able to otherwise. Easy to use and makes me smile using it
customer_reviews.author: John Magor

product_meta.title: Ohuhu Fruit Picker Tool, 13 FT Upgraded Fruit Picking Equipment with Shorter Contraction Pole & Detachable Metal Basket, Lightweight & Heavy Duty Aluminum Telescopic Pole, Bonus Fruit Carrying Bag
feature_bullets: 🍎 Fruit Picking Perfection: Why risk using dangerous ladders when you can stay on the ground and pick fruit with ease? It’s as easy as attaching the metal basket to the telescopic pole and hooking the fruit into the basket. Never miss out on the best fruit again! (Diameter of the basket: 5.5 in / Each gap distance: 0.79-1 inch)

🍐 Soft Landing Pad: Once you’ve snagged your prize, make sure it doesn’t get bruised falling into the basket! We’ve lined the bottom of the basket with a 1.2-inch sponge pad so your fruit has a nice soft landing so your fruit stays fresh and perfect.

🍊 Adjustable Pole Length: We all know about low hanging fruit, but the best, ripest ones on any tree are at the top! Thankfully you can use the telescopic fruit picker to get as high as you need to on any tree (reaches up to 13ft/4m). Or if you need a more maneuverable pole, simply adjust the pole accordingly. Either way, the Ohuhu Fruit Picker Tool will get you the fruit you want every time!

🍋 The Best of Strength and Weight: To keep the pole light and your reach high, we crafted the Ohuhu Fruit Picker with high-quality aluminum alloy to make sure you can get the job done right. From apples, oranges and avocados, to mangoes, lemons, and kiwis, the whole fruit farm will be at your disposal!

🥭 Bonus Fruit Carrying Bag: To make your life even easier, we’ve included a bonus fruit carrying bag so you can carry all of that freshly picked fruit home with you. Pick happy with the Ohuhu Food Picker Tool so you can get the best, ripest fruit, every time without leaving the ground!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
